p: Medicinal plants have been used since prehistoric times to treat different types of diseases, due to the presence of bioactive components (Inoue et al., 2019). Any part of these medicinal plants (fruit, seeds, roots, and flower) can be used for disease treatment (Gray et al., 2003). Phenolics and flavonoids present in plants reduce oxidative stress and inflammation, and help to regenerate the mucosal layer after injury (Shahidi & Yeo, 2018).
